settings.title: Are your fragrances authentic?
settings.content: Yes, all of our fragrances are 100% authentic. We source them directly from reputable manufacturers and authorized distributors, ensuring that every product we offer meets the highest standards of quality and authenticity. You can shop with confidence knowing that all our fragrances are genuine.

settings.title: Are your perfume accessories, Bakhoors, and other products authentic?
settings.content:
Absolutely! We take pride in offering only 100% authentic products. Our fragrances, Bakhoor, and all other items are directly sourced from reputable brands, manufacturers, and authorized distributors. This ensures that every product you purchase from us is genuine, high-quality, and meets the highest standards. 

We give you the confidence to shop comfortably, knowing you’re getting authentic products with every purchase.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.content: Orders Within UAE will be  delivered within 2- 5 business days, with same day delivery options available at a set minimum charge.

settings.title: How can I be sure that the products are authentic and new?
settings.content:
Every product Arabian Perfume House sells comes with an authenticity card and guarantee, all our product boxes go through quality checks to assure no product boxes are unsealed and entirely undamaged. 

Authenticity is confidently guaranteed as all our products are sourced from the brands directly. (Original Manufacturers or Authorized Distributors that are preapproved by the perfume brands themselves)

settings.title: What is your privacy policy?
settings.content: Arabian Perfume House offers a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee which means if you aren't entirely satisfied with your order you can return it for a full refund. We offer a 14 day return policy for all items. Items must be returned in unopened, unused condition and original packaging (which includes the plastic unsealed and unsealed box with no damage to the box)

settings.title: What happens if an item is out of stock?
settings.content: In the rare instance that an item is found to be out of stock after you place your order we will email you to notify you within 1 working day and issue an immediate, full refund.

settings.title: Accordion item
settings.content: After you have placed your order, you will receive an acknowledgement e-mail from us to confirm that your orders have been received. However, do note that orders will only be shipped when your credit card payment has been approved and billing and delivery address is verified. Alternatively, you may check the status of your order in “My Account” if you are a registered user.

settings.title: Accordion item
settings.content: You will be able to add the items as long as it is available. There could be an instance where the item is in someone else’s shopping cart hence the status of the items is reflected as “Temporarily Unavailable”.
